languages.text: "Вы простите деда, теряю мысль я... Так вот! Футфол. Там — Теневые кварталы. В них — кабак есть, в остове старого корабля устроенный. И в ентом баре в задней комнате ведет дела некая Ризза. Скажите ей, значит, что дедушка Бахвал передавал ей привет. Мигом станете ее любим{mf|ым|ой} клиент{mf|ом|кой}! Вот. Ну, ваш-благородие... мы пойдем?"

"Forgive an old man for getting distracted... So! Footfall. The Shadow Quarters. There's a bar there, built into the remains of an old ship. And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"
languages.original_text: "Вы простите деда, теряю мысль я... Так вот! Футфол. Там — Теневые кварталы. В них — кабак есть, в остове старого корабля устроенный. Ну, ваш-благородие... мы пойдем?"

And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"

languages.text: «Disculpe a este anciano por irse del tema... ¿Por dónde íbamos? Ah, Paso, los barrios bajos. Hay un bar allí, construido en los restos de una antigua nave. Y en ese bar, en la sala trasera, una tal Ryzza lleva a cabo sus negocios. Dígale que el abuelo Bakhval le manda saludos. ¡Será su cliente favorit{mf|o|a} en un abrir y cerrar de ojos! Ahí lo tiene. Bueno, Su Nobleza... ahora debemos irnos, si no le importa».
languages.original_text: "Forgive an old man for getting distracted... So! Footfall. The Shadow Quarters. There's a bar there, built into the remains of an old ship. And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe a este anciano por irse del tema... ¿Por dónde íbamos? Ah, Paso, los barrios bajos. Hay un bar allí, construido en los restos de una antigua nave. Y en ese bar, en la sala trasera, una tal Ryzza lleva a cabo sus negocios. Dígale que el abuelo Bakhval le manda saludos. ¡Será su cliente favorit{mf|o|a} en un abrir y cerrar de ojos! Ahí lo tiene. Bueno, Su Nobleza... ahora debemos irnos, si no le importa».

languages.text: "Verzeiht einem alten Mann, dass er ein wenig abgelenkt ist ... Also! Footfall. Die Schattenquartiere. Dort gibt es eine Bar im Wrack eines alten Schiffs. Und von dieser Bar aus, vom Hinterzimmer genauer gesagt, führt eine gewisse Ryzza ihre Geschäfte. Sagt Ihr schönen Gruß von Opa Bakhval. Dann gehört Ihr augenblicklich zu ihren Lieblingskunden! Und das war's. Also, Euer Erhabenheit ... wir gehen dann, wenn Ihr nichts dagegen habt?"
languages.original_text: "Forgive an old man for getting distracted... So! Footfall. The Shadow Quarters. There's a bar there, built into the remains of an old ship. And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht einem alten Mann, dass er ein wenig abgelenkt ist ... Also! Footfall. Die Schattenquartiere. Dort gibt es eine Bar im Wrack eines alten Schiffs. Und von dieser Bar aus, vom Hinterzimmer genauer gesagt, führt eine gewisse Ryzza ihre Geschäfte. Sagt Ihr schönen Gruß von Opa Bakhval. Dann gehört Ihr augenblicklich zu ihren Lieblingskunden! Und das war's. Also, Euer Erhabenheit ... wir gehen dann, wenn Ihr nichts dagegen habt?"

languages.text: « Pardon, j'ai perdu mon propre fil, c'est l'âge... Donc ! Castel. Le Quartier des Ombres. Vous y trouverez un bar, installé dans les vestiges d'un vieux vaisseau, et dans ce bar, dans l'arrière-salle, une certaine Ryzza, qui y mène ses petites affaires. Dites-lui que papy Bakhval lui passe le bonjour. En un clin d'œil, vous serez {mf|son client préféré|sa cliente préférée} ! Et voilà. Alors, Votre Noblesse... On va pouvoir y aller, vous pensez ? »
languages.original_text: "Forgive an old man for getting distracted... So! Footfall. The Shadow Quarters. There's a bar there, built into the remains of an old ship. And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"

traits.locale_text: « Pardon, j'ai perdu mon propre fil, c'est l'âge... Donc ! Castel. Le Quartier des Ombres. Vous y trouverez un bar, installé dans les vestiges d'un vieux vaisseau, et dans ce bar, dans l'arrière-salle, une certaine Ryzza, qui y mène ses petites affaires. Dites-lui que papy Bakhval lui passe le bonjour. En un clin d'œil, vous serez {mf|son client préféré|sa cliente préférée} ! Et voilà. Alors, Votre Noblesse... On va pouvoir y aller, vous pensez ? »

languages.text: “请原谅，我这个老头子跑题了……言归正传！落脚港的阴影区有家酒吧，建在一条旧飞船的残骸里，有个叫莱萨的人在酒吧的里间做生意。你跟她说‘巴卡瓦老爷子让我给你带个好’，你就会成为她最喜欢的熟客！话就说到这里吧，大人……如果您不介意的话，我们先走一步？”
languages.original_text: "Forgive an old man for getting distracted... So! Footfall. The Shadow Quarters. There's a bar there, built into the remains of an old ship. And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"

traits.locale_text: “请原谅，我这个老头子跑题了……言归正传！落脚港的阴影区有家酒吧，建在一条旧飞船的残骸里，有个叫莱萨的人在酒吧的里间做生意。你跟她说‘巴卡瓦老爷子让我给你带个好’，你就会成为她最喜欢的熟客！话就说到这里吧，大人……如果您不介意的话，我们先走一步？”

languages.text: 「すぐに気が散っちまう老いぼれを許してくれよ…それでだ！フットフォール、シャドウクォーターの話だ。古い船の跡に建てられた酒場がある。その酒場の奥の部屋で、リザという女が商売をしている。その女にバクヴァルじいさんがよろしく言ってたと伝えてくれ。そうすりゃあんたはあっという間に彼女のお得意様さ！そんなところかね。それじゃあ、貴族様…よければもう行ってもいいかね？」
languages.original_text: "Forgive an old man for getting distracted... So! Footfall. The Shadow Quarters. There's a bar there, built into the remains of an old ship. And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"

traits.locale_text: 「集中力の続かない老いぼれを許してくれ…それで！フットフォールの影地区だ。古い船の跡に建てられた酒場がある。その酒場の奥の部屋で、とあるルイッツアという女が商売をしている。バクヴァルじいさんがよろしく言ってたと伝えてくれ。あんたはあっという間に彼女のお得意様さ！こんなところかね。それじゃあ、貴族様…よければもう行ってもいいかね？」
「すぐに気が散っちまう老いぼれを許してくれよ…それでだ！フットフォール、シャドウクォーターの話だ。古い船の跡に建てられた酒場がある。その酒場の奥の部屋で、リザという女が商売をしている。その女にバクヴァルじいさんがよろしく言ってたと伝えてくれ。そうすりゃあんたはあっという間に彼女のお得意様さ！そんなところかね。それじゃあ、貴族様…よければもう行ってもいいかね？」
「すぐに気が散っちまう老いぼれを許してくれよ…それでだ！フットフォール、シャドウクォーターの話だ。古い船の跡に建てられた酒場がある。その酒場の奥の部屋で、リザという女が商売をしている。その女にバクヴァルじいさんがよろしく言ってたと伝えてくれ。そうすりゃあんたはあっという間に彼女のお得意様さ！そんなところかね。それじゃあ、貴族様…よければもう行ってもいいかね？」

languages.text: "Gene dağıttım konuyu. İhtiyarlık işte, affedin efendim. Ne diyorduk? Hah! Binliman, Gölge Mahalli. Orada bir bar var, eski bir geminin kalıntılarının içine inşa edilmiş. İşte o barda, arka odada Ryzza diye bir kadın iş yapar. Bakhval Dede'nin selamını söyleyin. Bir anda en sevdiği müşterisi oluvereceksiniz! İşte öyle soylu hazretleri. Sakıncası yoksa biz gidelim artık."
languages.original_text: "Forgive an old man for getting distracted... So! Footfall. The Shadow Quarters. There's a bar there, built into the remains of an old ship. And in that bar, in the back room, a certain Ryzza does her business. Tell her Grandpa Bakhval says hello. You'll be her favourite client in the blink of an eye! There we are. Well, Yer Nobleness... we'll be going now if you don't mind?"

traits.locale_text: "Gene dağıttım konuyu. İhtiyarlık işte, affedin efendim. Ne diyorduk? Hah! Binliman, Gölge Mahali. Orada bir bar var, eski bir geminin kalıntılarının içine inşa edilmiş. İşte o barda, arka odada Ryzza diye bir kadın iş yapar. Bakhval Dede'nin selamını söyleyin. Bir anda en sevdiği müşterisi oluvereceksiniz! İşte öyle soylu hazretleri. Sakıncası yoksa biz gidelim artık."
